attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Split banks into two, the old building society banks & Las Vegas casino investment banks, nationalise building societies and do not support investment banks but monitor them anyway. 
Building societies will pay people who are on benefits, will lend for mortgages and support purely owned British industries, agricultures and businesses that employ only British.
Give the employees and the public shares in the building societies banks, encourage foreign investors to buy bonds but not shares.
Regulate and monitor the way you like, every British will have shares and interest, so everybody will have a say, everybody will be watching and blow a whistle of misconduct.
